summary: For years, Congress has been trying to improve how DOD buys products and services by enacting annual acquisition reform legislation. DOD implements these reforms through regulations. We found that DOD has taken actions to address 180 acquisition reforms since 2010. On average, implementation was completed within a year of the legislation being enacted, but some provisions took over 2 years to implement. However, the status...
title: Defense Acquisitions: DOD Needs to Improve How It Communicates the Status of Regulation Changes
